rajawali.renderer

Class RenderTarget

  • java.lang.Object
    • rajawali.renderer.RenderTarget
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RenderTargetCube

    public class RenderTarget
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines configurations for a given render target.
    Author:
    Andrew Jo (andrewjo@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • RenderTarget

        public RenderTarget(int width,
            int height,
            int offsetX,
            int offsetY,
            boolean depthBuffer,
            boolean stencilBuffer,
            boolean mipmaps,
            int glType,
            Config bitmapConfig,
            ATexture.FilterType filterType,
            ATexture.WrapType wrapType)
        Instantiates a new RenderTarget object
        Parameters:
        width - Width of the render target
        height - Height of the render target
        offsetX - Horizontal offset of the render target
        offsetY - Vertical offset of the render target
        depthBuffer - Set to true to enable depth buffer
        stencilBuffer - Set to true to enable stencil buffer
        mipmaps - Set to true to enable automatic mipmap generation
        glType - Datatype to use for the texture
        bitmapConfig - Bitmap configuration
        filterType - Texture filter type
        wrapType - Texture wrap type

      • RenderTarget

        public RenderTarget(int width,
            int height)
        Instantiates a new RenderTarget object with default values
        Parameters:
        width - Width of the render target
        height - Height of the render target

      • isDepthBufferEnabled

        public boolean isDepthBufferEnabled()
        Returns whether depth buffer has been enabled for this render target.
        Returns:
        True if depth buffer is enabled, false otherwise.

      • enableDepthBuffer

        public void enableDepthBuffer(boolean depthBuffer)
        Sets whether depth buffer is enabled.
        Parameters:
        depthBuffer - Set to true to enable depth buffer.

      • isGenerateMipmaps

        public boolean isGenerateMipmaps()
        Returns whether this render target is set to automatically generate mipmaps.
        Returns:
        True if automatically generating mipmaps, false otherwise.

      • enableGenerateMipmaps

        public void enableGenerateMipmaps(boolean generateMipmaps)
        Sets whether automatic mipmap generation is enabled.
        Parameters:
        generateMipmaps - Set to true to enable automatic mipmap generation.

      • isStencilBufferEnabled

        public boolean isStencilBufferEnabled()
        Returns whether stencil buffer has been enabled for this render target.
        Returns:
        True if stencil buffer is enabled, false otherwise.

      • enableStencilBuffer

        public void enableStencilBuffer(boolean stencilBuffer)
        Sets whether stencil buffer is enabled.
        Parameters:
        stencilBuffer - Set to true to enable stencil buffer.

      • getBitmapConfig

        public Config getBitmapConfig()
        Gets the bitmap configuration of this render target.
        Returns:
        Bitmap configuration of this render type instance.

      • setBitmapConfig

        public void setBitmapConfig(Config bitmapConfig)
        Sets the bitmap configuration of this render target.
        Parameters:
        bitmapConfig - ARGB8888 and ARGB4444 configurations enable GL_RGBA mode, others enable GL_RGB mode

      • getFilterType

        public ATexture.FilterType getFilterType()
        Gets the texture filter type for this render target.
        Returns:
        LINEAR if using linear texture filtering, NEAREST if using nearest neighbor filtering.

      • setFilterType

        public void setFilterType(ATexture.FilterType filterType)
        Sets the texture filter type for this render target.
        Parameters:
        filterType -

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight()
        Returns the current texture height for this render target.
        Returns:
        The current texture height in pixels.

      • setHeight

        public void setHeight(int height)
        Sets the current texture height for this render target.
        Parameters:
        height - The current texture height in pixels. Set the dimension to power of two unless NPOT extensions are supported.

      • getOffsetX

        public int getOffsetX()
        Returns the horizontal value of the current texture offset coordinate.
        Returns:
        The x component of the offset coordinate.

      • setOffsetX

        public void setOffsetX(int offsetX)
        Sets the horizontal value of the current texture offset coordinate.
        Parameters:
        offsetX - The x component of the offset coordinate.

      • getOffsetY

        public int getOffsetY()
        Returns the vertical value of the current texture offset coordinate.
        Returns:
        The y component of the offset coordinate.

      • setOffsetY

        public void setOffsetY(int offsetY)
        Sets the vertical value of the current texture offset coordinate.
        Parameters:
        offsetY - The y component of the offset coordinate.

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()
        Returns the current texture width for this render target.
        Returns:
        The current texture width in pixels.

      • setWidth

        public void setWidth(int width)
        Sets the current texture width for this render target.
        Parameters:
        width - The current texture width in pixels. Set the dimension to power of two unless NPOT extensions are supported.

      • getWrapType

        public ATexture.WrapType getWrapType()
        Returns the current texture wrap type.
        Returns:
        CLAMP if set to clamp to edges, REPEAT if repeating.

      • setWrapType

        public void setWrapType(ATexture.WrapType wrapType)
        Sets the current texture wrap type.
        Parameters:
        wrapType - Set to CLAMP if clamping to edges, REPEAT if repeating.
